Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. 9 -- 15 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 9 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy and collect a special tax of fifteen (15) mills on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $770,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating recreation facilities in said District, including the purchase of equipment therefor?
